text: Doesn’t work - can’t copy deal data to contact, just contact to contact or company to contact or contact to company
Tons of “ideas” in HubSpot for it, doesn’t look like it’s been picked up though
Could you make a Zapier zap to ingest the deal data and post it to the contact record in a custom property?
Anyone run into this yet? I was not aware email sending domains were becoming Pro-exclusive:
<@U26BLKGE4> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U26BLKGE4/FBEC3QULT/screen_shot_2018-06-26_at_3.06.31_pm.png|Screen Shot 2018-06-26 at 3.06.31 PM.png>

was trying to set up a new client's portal and I'm unable to connect an email sending domain. The existing documentation (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/how-to-connect-your-email-sending-domain>) implies this feature should still be available for basic customers as well
has anybody used the HotJar forms tools with HubSpot?

Is it possible to host your blog on a subdirectory as opposed to a subdomain if your website isn’t hosted on HS COS and is on WordPress? If so how can you do this? Would you be able to add a subdirectory Blog root URL in settings to something like  “<http://example.com/insights> or would it have to include  “<http://blog.example.com/blog> or like so <http://example.com/blog>”? Client doesn’t want anything with blog in it. THX
